description:
Changed Instrument order
Added another quiet Snare to the Intro measures (the Vibraslap is pitched down and the 2nd Snare has reverb)
Included a sizzly effect during the Prelude/Interludes
Added a Bass detail during the Prelude/Interludes
Added small details to Vocals
Edited the Guitar Riff in the Choruses
title: It's been so long

description:

description: Adjusted the Volume of Agogo and the supposed Snare in the Intro

description:
Added Chords and Note names to some Instruments, changed some Sections and Instruments names
Edited the Intro Violins, added Agogo and what appears to be quiet Snares
Improved the Warm Keyboard in the Prelude and Interlude
Added some details to Vocals
Brought back the Electric Piano
Adjusted the Bass Volume
Updated Clean Guitar in the Verse and Outro
title: It's been so long

description: Added some Harmony to Vocals at the Pre-Chorus and Chorus

description:

description:
Update of this tab: https://www.songsterr.com/a/wsa/its-been-so-long-the-living-tombstone-tab-s494469t0
Rearranged and changed some Instruments
Improved Vocals and added Lyrics
Added a Bass track
Added another Synth track, Changed Piano to Honky-Tonk
Improved Guitars
Merged Triangle and Vibraslap and moved them to the Drum track
Added details to Drums
Some Volume changes
title: It's been so long
